chapter.text: This has all been for you. ^1500Although for me, it has been fun to see what you chose. ^1500It always is. ^1500I mean, 31.11% of you, after seeing what happened to the janitor before, still decided to hide! ^1500It is so interesting to see everything that you all have chosen, and everything that you have done. ^1500None of this would exist without you. ^1500You choose to watch, and therefore, I exist. ^1500If no one voted, nothing would have happened, but you chose anyway.
